string.description: name of the ClusterNotifier
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
A simple user provided description of this Notifier

list.description: A list of references to Providers to send to for notifications matching any source in this Notifier

A list of alarm excludes for this Notifier, matching the 'kind' field within alarms.
If a source matches both the 'sources' and 'excludes' lists, it will be excluded.
For example, 'InterfaceMemberDown'.

A list of alarms that this Notifier will listen to, matching the 'kind' field within alarms.
Including all alarms is indicated using the '*' wildcard.
For example, 'InterfaceDown'.

Namespaces to consider when selecting alarms for this Notifier.
Alarms from these namespaces will be either included or excluded based on the other filters.

single_nested.description: Include alarm sources in this notifier

string.description: Sets the color of notifications generated from this query. Valid values are web color names, e.g. 'red', 'green', 'blue', 'yellow', 'purple', 'gray', etc.

list.description:
Fields to include in the query results, which can then be used in the template,
e.g. '.node.name' or '.node.srl.interface.name"'.

string.description: The table to use for the query, e.g. '.node.srl.interface'

A template to use when sending notifications for this query. The template can use the fields from the query results.
e.g. 'Interface {{ index . "interface.name" }} is down on node {{ index . "node.name" }}'.
The title to use when presenting results for this query, e.g. 'InterfaceDown'
A where clause to use for the query, e.g. 'oper-state = down'. You can omit enclosing parentheses.

single_nested.description: Include a query source in this notifier
Set the notifier sources
ClusterNotifierSpec defines the desired state of ClusterNotifier
ClusterNotifierStatus defines the observed state of ClusterNotifier

string.description: a comma-separated list of resource fields to fetch/return.  If unspecified, all fields are fetched.  If empty, only key-fields are fetched.
an EQL "where" expression that will be used to filter the set of resources returned.
a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
A simple user provided description of this Notifier

string.description: name of the ClusterProvider
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
A simple user provided description of this Provider

A URI to send notifications to. For example 'slack://token-a/token-b/token-c',
or 'discord://discord.com/api/webhooks/channel/token'.

single_nested.description: ClusterProviderSpec defines the desired state of ClusterProvider
ClusterProviderStatus defines the observed state of ClusterProvider
